column5: Hello Fishing Fanatics,  I came across this interesting article a few days ago, talking about how forensics is now being used to validate and authenticate the fish photos being  submitted for the fishing tournaments.  In this article are a few tips for spotting an image that has been photoshopped.  Forensic verification for fishing photoshopped images
Well of all the lowlife....!!!  I would never dream of doing anything so vile!!!
yeah they can tell if you stretch a fish   that's why I keep the fish the same size and make everything else in the photo smaller
Forensic verification is not needed for our members' fish pics. I've said it before, as soon as money enters the equation, the game is over.
You came across an article that is on the site that you link to on a daily basis? Wow..that is a coincidence. It is also known as spam.
photoshop  the creative way to protect your fishing spots
